entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 40 km/h diminishing to 20 this morning. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 55 this morning and minus 43 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 06:41 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill near minus 51. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 06:41 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
